text: And?  Your turn, Sharon.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: It's just that... the Book of Mormon says a lot of strange stuff, like that Adam and Eve lived in Jackson County, Missouri.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Yes.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: But school taught me that the first man and woman lived in Africa.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Well you can't believe everything school tells you, Stan. Your turn, Shelley. Oooo, that must be the Harrisons!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Hey everybody.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Wow, what a great house!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: You must be Mrs. Marsh; it's so nice to meet youuu!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: And you must be Stan's sister. Oh, I think your brother's the greatest.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: My brother is a stupid turd.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Hey Stan.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Hey Gary.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Well, come on in and sit down, everybody. You're here just in time. My son was having a little problem with our new religion.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Dad!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Ohohoho, really? Wel, that's just because he hasn't heard the best part about the Joseph Smith story! The one that proves he was for real!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Yeah! Woohoo!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Ooo, what's that?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Well, you remember Martin Harris, the rich man who wrote down what Joseph Smith read out of the hat?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Yeah.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: See, after he was done, he took some of the pages of what would become the Book of Mormon home.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Back to the 1800s, night, the large building

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Martin went home to his wife

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
role: And showed her pages from the Book of Mormon

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: A-and so Joseph Smith put his head into a hat, a-and read to me what the golden plates said. I wrote it all down and we're gonna publish it into a book.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Martin, how do you know he isn't just making stuff up and pretending he's translating off golden plates?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Lucy Harris smart smart smart

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Why would he make it up?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Martin Harris dumb dadumb-

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: All right, here. I'm gonna hide these pages.  If Joseph Smith really is translating off of golden plates, then he'll be able to do it again. But if Joseph Smith is making it all up, then the new translations will be different from these.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Okay, fine. I bet he'll have no problem.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Lucy Harris smart smart smart

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
role: So Martin went on back to Smith

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
role: Said the pages had gone away

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
role: Smith got mad and told Martin

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Look, ah I'm sorry about losin' the pages we worked on, Joe, but I'm ready to write it all down again if you translate from the plates.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: I would love to, Martin, except, I just had a vision. And the Lord said he's very angry with me for letting you take those pages.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: He is??

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Dumb dumb dumb dumb dumb

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Yes. He is so mad that he will never let me translate from the plate of Lehi again. He's... we must now translate from the plate of Nephi. So it will be the same basic story, but written a little differently.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Wow! If God got angry with you, then you must be tellin' the truth.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Dumb dumb dumb dumb dumb dumb dumb.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: All right, Martin. Let's get to work!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Back to the present, the Marsh house

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: And that's how it happened.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Yeah! All right!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: ...Wait. Mormons actually know this story and they still believe Joseph Smith was a prophet?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Well sure. The story proves it, doesn't it?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: No, it proves he DID make it all up. Are you blind?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Well, Stan, it's all a matter of faith.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: No, it's a matter of logic! If you're gonna say things that have been proven wrong, like that the first man and woman lived in Missouri, and that Native Americans came from Jerusalem, then you'd better have something to back it up. All you've got are a bunch of stories about some asswipe who read plates nobody ever saw out of a hat, and then couldn't do it again when the translatios were hidden!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Hey, Stan, don't denounce our religion.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: I don't wanna be Mormon, Dad!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Me neither.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Hey, that's only cool, guys. You can believe whatever you want!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Yeah, it's great you have your own beliefs.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Yeah! Hooray for the Marshes!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Oh, stop it!  That's another thing! Why do you have to be so freakin' nice all the time?! It isn't normal! You just weasel people into your way of thinking by acting like the happiest family in the world and being so nice to everyone that you just blindside dumb people like my Dad!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Yeah!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Well kids... Who's up for a water balloon fight?!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Yeah! All right!

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: The bus stop, next day. Kyle, Cartman and Kenny wait for the bus, Stan walks up somewhat somberly

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Oh, hey Stan. Where's your best buddy, Gary?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: I'm not hanging around that kid anymore.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Oh no! You guys broke up?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: You guys were right, okay? The new kid's a douche. Now I just gotta find a way to keep him away from me.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Hey Stan.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Oh brother.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Uh oh, the jilted lover returns.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Listen, I just wanted to let you know you don't have to worry about me tryin' to be your friend anymore.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: I don't?

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Look, maybe us Mormons do believe in crazy stories that make absolutely no sense, and maybe Joseph Smith did make it all up, but I have a great life. and a great family, and I have the Book of Mormon to thank for that. The truth is, I don't care if Joseph Smith made it all up, because what the church teaches now is loving your family, being nice and helping people. And even though people in this town might think that's stupid, I still choose to believe in it. All I ever did was try to be your friend, Stan, but you're so high and mighty you couldn't look past my religion and just be my friend back. You've got a lot of growing up to do, buddy. Suck my balls.

title: ALL ABOUT THE MORMONS
text: Damn, that kid is cool, huh?
